name: Crashing Robot, Hidden Puzzle
description:
"You are from a small village named Hyksruun, a farming settlement on the edge of the Byros Plains. Your people work the fields, providing the necessary food for a healing land.

Hunters, the delvers who plumb the depths of the ancient ruins of the World Before, often stop in your village, and you have been raised on their tales. When you come of age, you make the decision to join their ranks.

On your first Hunt, you stumble across a Override Gauntlet, an ancient artifact much prized by Hunters. You are taught in its use, testing out its ability to hack the World Before's machinery.
A year passes by, and armed with your Override Gauntlet and tales of untold treasures in the Datos Ruins near Hyksruun, you venture back home.

As you step into the Datos Ruins, you begin to hear the grinding of ancient machines awaking from their centuries-long slumber..."

Crashing Robot, Hidden Puzzle is a first-person stealth game where you take on the role of a Hunter, a delver into the ruins of the World Before in search of treasure and technology to make life better for a healing world. Dodge the security robots watching and patrolling the ruins, find the transport pillars to descend deeper into the ruins, and see what treasures await you! You may soon discover that you have stumbled across a much larger treasure, and far greater danger, than you could have imagined!
